circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
fill: none; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
fill: none; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-opacity: 1;
